tool_description: An API for diving centres,boats and shops that allow developers to access information about PADI, SSI, and SDI dive operators around the world.
name: World Dive Centres Api
title: World Dive Centres Api

api_list.name: Query Dive Operators by a country or a region.
api_list.description: The endpoint returns a json list of dive sites which match the region or country entered as the query. The range of results depend but there is usually around 100-500 sites for each country. There are around 15'000 dive sites listed in the database.

test_endpoint.message: You are not subscribed to this API.
